function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exclusion of individuals without internet access from the research may lead to a biased representation of the population's social media use during the pandemic.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of social media use and its impact on individuals who do not have internet access.","Mitigation":"Conduct outreach programs and surveys in communities to include individuals without internet access.","Technologies":"Community outreach programs, paper-based surveys, and telephone interviews.","People":"Individuals without internet access, especially those affected by the lockdown.","Owner":"Researchers, government, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of physical data collection due to lockdown may limit the scope and accuracy of the research findings.","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of the impact of COVID-19 on social media use and behavior.","Mitigation":"Use multiple data collection methods such as online surveys, telephone interviews, and secondary data analysis.","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, telephone survey tools, and data analysis software.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, and survey participants.","Owner":"Research team and data collection agencies."},{"Description":"Limited availability of standardized questions related to COVID-19 may affect the consistency and comparability of the survey data.","Impact":"Difficulty in comparing the results with existing literature and research studies.","Mitigation":"Develop and validate standardized survey questions specifically tailored to COVID-19 impact on social media use.","Technologies":"Survey design software, statistical analysis tools, and validation techniques.","People":"Research team, survey participants, and experts in survey design.","Owner":"Researchers and survey design experts."}]}
